name: 街机游戏盒子
description:
There are various games on the cute planet
Cars that keep running and want to escape from the cage
A small ball that moves above a critical wall, a box that jumps between mountains and forests.
Time passing clocks and walls of Tetris.

I believe there is always one that will make you addicted!

Game Features

- Simple and fresh style
- Easy to use
- Choose from multiple game combinations
